text: is a Japanese politician and the current governor of Nagasaki Prefecture located in the Kyushu region of Japan. He was re-elected for another four-year term as governor in both 2014 and 2018.Nagasaki Gov. Nakamura wins re- election, Japan Times, February 2, 2014., Japan Times, February 4, 2018. ==Anti-nuclear== Governor Nakamura together with Nagasaki City mayor Tomihisa Taue filed a protest against the first U.S nuclear test under President Barack Obama.US Nuclear Test Under Fire In Nagasaki, Hiroshima, Weekly Voice, October 17, 2010. == References == Category:1964 births Category:Living people Category:Nagasaki University alumni
title: Hōdō Nakamura
